data.text: Nsa yɛ ɔfɛwdifo na nsaden yɛ ɔtɔkwapɛfo;
Ɔhene abufuwhyew te sɛ gyata mmubomu;
Ɛyɛ onipa anuonyam sɛ ɔbɛkwati akasakasa,
Onihawfo mfuntum nʼasase wɔ ne bere mu;
Onipa koma botae yɛ asubun,
Nnipa dodow no ara ka se wɔwɔ ɔdɔ a ɛnsa da,
Ɔtreneeni bu ɔbra kronkron;
Sɛ ɔhene tena nʼahengua so bu atɛn a,
Hena na obetumi aka se, “Mapra me koma mu;
Nkaribo ne susudua a ɛnyɛ papa no,
Mpo wɔnam abofra nketewa nneyɛe so hu wɔn,
Aso a wɔde te asɛm ne ani a wɔde hu ade,
Mma nna nyɛ wo dɛ, na woanni hia;
Adetɔni ka se, “Enye, enye!”
Sika kɔkɔɔ wɔ hɔ, na nhene pa nso abu so,
Fa obi a odi ɔhɔho akagyinamu atade;
Aduan a wonya no ɔkwan bɔne so no yɛ onipa anom dɛ,
Pɛ afotu yɛ wo nhyehyɛe;
Osekuni da kokoamsɛm adi;
Sɛ obi dome nʼagya anaasɛ ne na a,
Agyapade a wɔpere ho nya no,
Nka se, “Metua wo saa bɔne yi so ka!”
Awurade kyi nkaribo a ɛnyɛ papa,
Awurade na ɔkyerɛ onipa anammɔntu.
Obi pɛ ntɛm hyɛ bɔ, ansa na wadwene ho a,
Ɔhene nyansafo hu amumɔyɛfo;
Awurade kanea hwehwɛ onipa honhom mu,
Ɔdɔ ne nokwaredi bɔ ɔhene ho ban;
Mmerante anuonyam ne wɔn ahoɔden,
Ɔhwe ne apirakuru hohoro amumɔyɛ,
